duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitor and convey process project developments.
Offer oversight for installation, commencement, and performance evaluation of simultaneous projects.
Educate the plant crew in the formulation of operating procedures.
Investigate and interpret data to enhance production, efficiencies, and cut down on defects and operating costs. Compile summary reports.
Furnish technical backing during unexpected occurrences and scheduled downtimes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or akin field, with preference for Chemical specialization.
